meanings.definition: A type of flooring material made from linoleum.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen floor was covered in lino.
meanings.sent2: She chose lino for the bathroom because it's easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the lino was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Walking on the lino felt like stepping on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The bright red lino in the hallway brightened up the whole house.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the name 'Linoleum'.
meanings.sent1: He asked the store clerk for a roll of lino.
meanings.sent2: The label on the cleaning product read 'Contains lino'.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled at the word 'lino' on the packaging.
meanings.sent4: Her nickname 'Lino' stuck since high school.
meanings.sent5: The sign outside the shop advertised 'Lino Flooring'.

meanings.definition: A type of printmaking technique using linoleum as a relief surface.
meanings.sent1: The art class learned how to carve lino for prints.
meanings.sent2: The artist's lino prints were displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled ink on the lino block.
meanings.sent4: The lino print of a flower looked so realistic.
meanings.sent5: The lino carving tools were sharp and precise.
